messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Interesting News About Breastmilk
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/13/2008 7:48:44 A.M. Pacific Standard Time, heatherbean@gmail.com writes: http://www.sciencealert.com.au/news/20081102-16879.html I saw
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/13/2008 7:48:44 A.M. Pacific Standard Time,
heatherbean@... writes:

http://www.sciencealert.com.au/news/20081102-16879.html


I saw that too! Sad though that it came out (the study) over a year ago, but
glad it got published at least somewhere! :) I copied it yesterday and put
it on a message board I belong to...or was it the day before, lol? Anyway - I
loved it!

Karen
